amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consist of the text of those amendments contained in House Report 107-450 which are printed on pages H2328-H2330 in the Congressional Record for May 9, 2002.
amendment.purpose: An en bloc amendment comprised of the part B amendments Nos. 11, 12, 13, 14, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20, 22, 23, 24, and 25 printed in House Report 107-450.

action.text: On agreeing to the Stump amendments (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
